CMArticle.name: Press Release - Chef Corp. Announces Partnership with Chinese Manufacturer ChongXing Article
CMArticle.title: Chef Corp. Announces Partnership with Chinese Manufacturer ChongXing
CMArticle.teaserTitle: Chef Corp. Announces Partnership with ChongXing

div.p: Chef Corp. is proud to announce our new partnership with Chinese Manufacturer ChongXing which will open the Chinese Market for Chef Corp.'s products. Based out of Beijing, ChongXing's dense distribution network in all major cities across China and its established customer base of restaurants open incredible joint opportunities.

Chef Corp. is proud to announce our new partnership with Chinese Manufacturer ChongXing which will open the Chinese Market for Chef Corp.'s products. Based out of Beijing, ChongXing's dense distribution network in all major cities across China and its established customer base of restaurants open incredible joint opportunities. In addition to increased sales, ChongXing will also provide manufacturing of customer-grade appliances at a very competitive cost - whilst close working relationships with Chef Corp.'s engineers will ensure the high quality and craftmanship that Chef Corp. customers are delighted by.

Since 1999, our more than 125,000 customers have come to know Chef Corp as their premier provider to find virtually anything needed for the restaurant supply industry. We are committed to delivering you expert solutions with the personal attention you deserve.

Our services range from commercial kitchen supplies, including our special dedication to kitchen lighting; to our consumer offering, Perfect Chef, an omni-channel shop and customer magazine that delivers seasonal news, ideas, recipes, and handpicked products to inspire cooks and connoisseurs of the good life – in all of its forms.
